metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: Do you know what it takes to be the best support to a Manager? In the role of Assistant Store Manager you will be assisting on all store operations related matters such as sales, staff performance, store maintenance, visual merchandise and everything else that concerns the store up to our standards.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: Suitsupply is an international men's fashion brand with more than 100 stores worldwide across major metropolitan cities like Paris, Milan, London, Zurich, Sydney, New York, Toronto, Shanghai, and Hong Kong. The company operates a strong e-commerce platform which is accelerating and allows it to bring that same high-quality tailoring and personal service to customers around the world. At Suitsupply we are transitioning our IT landscape from a palette of home grown, on premise applications to cloud first, industry leading systems that are scalable and ensure growth for the company on the long term. As part of this transition Suitsupply is in the process of implementing state of the art Order Management system, selecting brand new PLM tooling, and onboarding an ERP suite is around the corner. And there is more! As Business Analyst Supply Chain you play an important role in these projects by gathering business requirements, unravel and visualize complex processes and identify opportunities for improvement. You will provide quantitative and qualitative analysis, prepare documentation for the development teams that build the integrations, support testing and work with Product Owners and business partners to ensure informed decisions can be made.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Customer Experience Coordinator, you help set the tone and ensure delivery of our Radically Personal customer journey. Consider yourself the store’s lead ambassador of the brand and point of reference for the customer. You support all activities necessary for the efficient operation of the store experience and provide exemplary service to maximize sales, promote the Company’s image of quality and professionalism. A Customer Experience Coordinator performs duties, in partnership with their management team, with the specific focus of shaping the store experience.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Customer Experience Coordinator (In-store), you help set the tone and ensure delivery of our Radically Personal customer journey. Consider yourself the store’s lead ambassador of the brand and point of reference for the customer. You support all activities necessary for the efficient operation of the store experience and provide exemplary service to maximize sales, promote the Company’s image of quality and professionalism. A Customer Experience Coordinator performs duties, in partnership with their management team, with the specific focus of shaping the store experience.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: Suitsupply is always pushing the boundaries of customer service, aiming to deliver the highest standards of care to our customers globally. We are hiring a Customer Service Specialist for our international, social, sales-driven, and dynamic Customer Service team. If you have a keen interest in fashion and have a fresh perspective on customer service, we’d love to hear from you!

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: Reporting to the Regional Customer Operations Manager, you’ll lead by example: actively handling customer cases while leading a team of senior and junior agents. Your role balances daily operations, coaching, and performance management, with a strong emphasis on empowering your team, fostering trust, and nurturing a supportive environment that drives collective success.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As an EMEA Payroll Specialist, you will be responsible for managing the payroll for multiple entities. This includes running payroll reports, coordinating and verifying payroll with external vendors, providing final payroll reports, and ensuring all relevant payments are made in a timely and accurate manner. You will need to maintain relationships with both external payroll vendors and internal stakeholders.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: The Engineering Manager steers multiple teams within the same domain (i.e. an Engineering Manager for ecommerce, steering the ecommerce teams). He/She is an agile leader, the team is responsible for its own success. If the team is not delivering, then the Engineering Manager should step in and make sure they are delivering.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: The Head of VM is responsible for developing and driving the global visual merchandising strategy, ensuring a consistent and impactful brand experience across all regions and store formats. the Head of VM manages a team of regional VM Managers, and collaborates closely with key cross-functional partners (Styling, Merchandising, Allocation, Retail Managers, and Retail Operations). This role requires an exceptional blend of creativity, commercial acumen, and operational expertise, with a strong understanding of menswear and global retail dynamics.

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: Our approach to men's fashion is strongly setting us apart from the establishment and is creating new space with tailoring at its core

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: People who don't just want to fit in but want to find their own way and their own perfect fit.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: Professionals with a pioneering spirit who are straight to the point, effective and have a strong sense of aesthetic & flair.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: We are looking for a Junior Buyer to work within our Ready to Wear Production Team. Our approach to men's fashion is strongly setting us apart from the establishment and is creating new space with tailoring at its core. We are there for people who want to be seen. People who don't just want to fit in but want to find their own way and their own perfect fit. Professionals with a pioneering spirit who are straight to the point, effective and have a strong sense of aesthetic & flair.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Merchandise Allocator in EMEA, you will develop a deep understanding of the customer needs for each store, analyse sales trends and optimize the distribution of our products. You will provide feedback and insights on the market needs to the merchandising and design teams to ensure future assortments and replenishment orders are in line with the market.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Merchandise Planner at Suitsupply, you'll be ensuring the right products are available at the right time to meet customer demands. You'll dive into sales data, forecasting future trends, and crafting strategies to optimize inventory levels while balancing sales and profitability. Collaborating closely with various teams, you'll contribute in shaping our global business and influence our rapid growth. In this role you'll be partnering with Merchandising, Production, Allocation teams.

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: As a Producer, you will lead and execute all in-house fashion shoots and castings, ensuring seamless coordination from concept to completion.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: You will be responsible for scouting and selecting models who embody Suitsupply’s aesthetic, managing shoot logistics, and collaborating with creative and marketing teams to bring brand campaigns to life.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: This role requires a strong eye for detail, exceptional organizational skills, and a passion for the fashion industry.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Producer, you will lead and execute all in-house fashion shoots and castings, ensuring seamless coordination from concept to completion. You will be responsible for scouting and selecting models who embody Suitsupply’s aesthetic, managing shoot logistics, and collaborating with creative and marketing teams to bring brand campaigns to life. This role requires a strong eye for detail, exceptional organizational skills, and a passion for the fashion industry. Your work will directly shape how our brand is visually represented, driving the quality and success of every campaign and lookbook.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Sales Supervisor, you are an independent professional, with a high level of responsibility and identifying and solving problems is something that comes naturally to you.  You have an opinion and share that with others through genuine and straight to the point communication. Sales Supervisors are excited to build relationships and have a personal approach to each interaction.

location.name: Long Island, New York, United States

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Sales Support, you play a critical role in a successful customer journey. You have a contagious energy and possess an entrepreneurial spirit. You have a strong sense of your own personal style and are enthusiastic about hospitality. You will be responsible for facilitating strong customer relationships and have a personal approach to each interaction.

location.name: New York, New York, United States

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Sales Support, you will support the Sales team by ensuring that the store is fully prepared and stocked throughout the working day. You will be responsible for receiving deliveries and organizing the stock and the store. With your help, the Sales team will be assisting our customers in the best way they can!

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: As a Senior Digital Designer & Art Director, you will shape the future look and feel of Suitsupply across all digital touchpoints.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: You’ll combine hands-on design expertise with strong art direction skills, collaborating with our creative team, e-commerce stakeholders, marketing department, photographers, and freelancers to bring seasonal campaigns to life.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: We’re looking for a highly creative individual with a sharp eye for fashion, photography, typography, and digital storytelling—someone who can elevate our brand visually while guiding others in the process.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value:
As a Senior Digital Designer & Art Director, you will shape the future look and feel of Suitsupply across all digital touchpoints. You’ll combine hands-on design expertise with strong art direction skills, collaborating with our creative team, e-commerce stakeholders, marketing department, photographers, and freelancers to bring seasonal campaigns to life. 

We’re looking for a highly creative individual with a sharp eye for fashion, photography, typography, and digital storytelling—someone who can elevate our brand visually while guiding others in the process.

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: As Senior Planning Lead, you’ll own the financial planning, forecasting, and inventory management for one of our key product categories and overseeing other planners in the team.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: You’ll partner closely with Merchandising, Production, Allocation and Online Merchandise to ensure we are maximizing sales, margin, and inventory productivity, while putting our customer’s need firsts and without compromising our obsession with high quality product.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: This isn’t a role for someone who wants to follow a playbook. We expect our Planning leaders to bring ideas, make bold calls, and drive the business forward.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value:
As Senior Planning Lead, you’ll own the financial planning, forecasting, and inventory management for one of our key product categories and overseeing other planners in the team. You’ll partner closely with Merchandising, Production, Allocation and Online Merchandise to ensure we are maximizing sales, margin, and inventory productivity, while putting our customer’s need firsts and without compromising our obsession with high quality product.
This isn’t a role for someone who wants to follow a playbook. We expect our Planning leaders to bring ideas, make bold calls, and drive the business forward.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: Raise the bar on our code base

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: If you’re a proactive, problem-solving team player who likes to take ownership of your work, this could be the job for you. As a senior member, you not only bring an abundance of expertise to your team, but you also know how to inspire, uplift and bring out the best in your colleagues. Always striving for continuous improvement, you adapt to change easily and are always eager to learn. In a flat organization like Suitsupply, there are ample opportunities to broaden your horizons by moving between different teams, and strengthen your skill set within the wider organization. Suitsupply is growing in every aspect IT-wise, and therefore, we're looking for Senior Software Engineers to join us on the journey of becoming the global tailoring expert.

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Stock Supervisor, you will work in partnership with the leadership team to ensure optimal preparedness for the customer experience. You will be responsible for receiving deliveries, organizing stock and identifying areas of opportunity for the store operations and allocation teams. As a Stock Supervisor, you have a close attention to detail, are tech savvy, with exceptional time management and organizational skills.

location.name: Long Island, New York, United States

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value: As a Style Advisor, you have a contagious energy and possess an entrepreneurial spirit. You have a strong sense of your own personal style and are enthusiastic about dressing people. You have an opinion and share that with others through genuine and straight to the point communication. Style Advisors are excited to build relationships and have a personal approach to each interaction.

metadata.name: Job USPs 1
metadata.value: Craftsmanship at Its Core.  Work with premium fabrics and world-class tailoring standards.  Hone your skills in a company rooted in precision, fit, and personal service.

metadata.name: Job USPs 2
metadata.value: Radically Personal Service.  Bring each client’s vision to life through expert alterations and customizations.

metadata.name: Job USPs 3
metadata.value: Blend traditional hand-finishing with contemporary tailoring innovations

metadata.name: Meta data summary (SEO & Application form)
metadata.value:
You said:
Job USPs for tailors
ChatGPT said:
Here’s a concise list of Job USPs (Unique Selling Points) you can use to highlight the Tailor role — tailored (pun intended) for Suitsupply’s tone and employer branding:

✂️ Tailor – Job USPs
1. Craftsmanship at Its Core

Work with premium fabrics and world-class tailoring standards.

Hone your skills in a company rooted in precision, fit, and personal service.

2. Radically Personal Service

Bring each client’s vision to life through expert alterations and customizations.

Be part of a team that turns fittings into memorable experiences.

3. Modern Tools, Timeless Techniques

Access industry-leading equipment in a modern atelier environment.

Blend traditional hand-finishing with contemporary tailoring innovations.

4. Growth and Mastery

Continuous training to perfect your technique and expand your craftsmanship.

Clear development path toward Senior Tailor, Master Tailor, or Studio Lead roles.

5. Global Brand, Local Pride

Join an international company with a strong reputation for quality and fit.

Work alongside a diverse, passionate team that values style and detail.

6. Style Meets Function

Contribute directly to the final product that defines Suitsupply’s reputation.

Enjoy the satisfaction of seeing your work worn by clients every day.

7. Environment That Inspires

Clean, well-equipped tailoring studios located inside our stores.

A culture that celebrates craftsmanship, collaboration, and individuality.

Would you like me to adapt these for a job posting format (e.g., “What You Will Do / Who You Are / What You’ll Get”) or keep them as standalone USPs for an internal campaign or presentation?

You said:
tailor short description 3-4 sentences
ChatGPT said:
A Tailor at Suitsupply brings craftsmanship and precision to every garment, ensuring the perfect fit and finish for each client. Working with premium fabrics and modern tools, you’ll deliver expert alterations and personalized touches that define our radically personal service. In this role, you’ll blend timeless tailoring techniques with contemporary style, creating a look and experience that’s uniquely Suitsupply.
